Translations.Text: (GOD NIE forgive idol KULT maintained SMRT) He forgives lesser offenses whomever He wills! Ktokolvek idolizes any idol GOD has strayed daleko astray
They vecer kult zenska gods Him; mat rad a zalezitost z fact, they len kult rebellious devil
GOD condemned him he said JA ISTE recruit definite share TVOJ worshipers
Ja zmylit them ja entice them ja command them (zakazat jestn z certain meats zatrhnut ears zivy inventar ja command them distort creation GOD Ktokolvek accepts devil lord GOD incurred profound loss)
He promises them entices them; co devil promises bol ziaden inak than iluzia
These incurred Hell ich zaverecny abode never evade it
Mat rad for those verit lead righteous zivot my admit them zahrada flowing streams wherein they zivy forever Such bol truthful promise GOD Whose utterances je truthful than GOD's
It je v accordance s tvoj zelat zelat ludia scripture ktokolvek commits zly platit for it nie have helper supporter GOD
Mat rad for those lead righteous zivot muzsky zenska chvila verit they zapisat Raj; slightest injustice
Kto je lepsie guided jeho nabozenstvo than jeden submits totally GOD leads righteous zivot creed z Abraham monotheism? GOD ZVOLIT SI Abraham beloved ZNAMY
Do GOD belongs everything heavens zem! GOD bol full control all things
